comment: Great professor! Love her classes and teaching style. Very to the point no BS. Lots of group work but it helps more then you think in the long run. So far my fav professor on campus.
2 Roleplays. 2 Tests. 1 Paper (must interview a professional). Lots of group work. She is great professor and would definitely recommend her.
Outstanding Professor. she makes learning easy and is very knowledgeable in her field. It is easy to get an A in her classes. There is a lot of group work required but it is not a big deal.

Outstanding Professor. she makes learning easy and is very knowledgeable in her field. It is easy to get an A in her class. Lots of group work required but it is not a big deal. took two of her classes this semester and plan to take her again next semester.

She is a wonderful teacher. I have personally never heard anyone complain about her teaching style. Yes, it is an easy A but at the same time you learn alot because she is a very experienced LCSW and she really cares about her students. She is a great teacher and mentor.
Professor B is amazing!! Very funny and energetic. Makes you want to come to class. Very easy A.

Ms. B makes learning fun and uses conversations instead boring power points. She does not always use the book for lecture, however the book was helpful with Working with Support groups. She is an AMAZING professor :)
TAKE CLASS AT ALL COSTS FREE A
Love Ms B!  I just wish I  hadn't already taken the classes she teaches before she started here so I could take her again!  She makes the class so interesting you wish you could stay longer.
She is an amazing professor. She knows what she is talking bout and you will learn alot. She is also funny. Take her. One of the best professors.
Great teacher! Very personable and funny. Makes class interesting, really cares about her students.
EXCELLENT. Truly makes learning the group process fun and interested. Very understanding and laid back

Professor B!  Made this 8:00 AM class worth coming to. She give the class alot of examples about how to handle situtions in the field and how to make your personal community a better place to live. This was my second class with Professor B and I learned a great deal about myself as a person, thanks to her. Her motto was get involved with a cause!

I loved Ms. B. She is such a character and makes the class so much fun! This was my fave class this semester by far! She can get a little off topic but she is the most kind hearted and open professor I have had! Love you Ms. B!! :)

Prof. B was a hoot! She made u laugh out loud and loved to teach and share her experience from being in the field. U will need the book and her exams were essay questions. Loved the class, she is new to KSU! but an added bonus to Human Service Dept.
